Use the evidence from the source: Fed cut probability (86 % for 9/25), steepening 2‑yr/10‑yr spread (current 60 bp), tariff truce, and Ukrainian sentiment. This will satisfy the acceptance gate and produce a concise, actionable swing‑trade outlook.
